title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 22.22 - Compliance with regulations of the comptroller of the currency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 22.22 - Compliance with regulations of the comptroller of the currency

State Regulations

Nothing in this Part shall be construed to prohibit trust
companies from taking action or refraining from action as required by the rules
and regulations, prevailing from time to time of the Comptroller of the

Currency pertaining to the collective investment of trust funds by national
banks. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
22.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
